name: jeff-choices
description: A collection of plugins for Jeff's workflow

plugins.name: assistant
plugins.description: Personal assistant for managing TODOs and journal entries, supporting task tracking, activity logging, and smart querying through natural conversation.

plugins.name: speckit-driver
plugins.description: Autonomous Spec-Driven Development orchestrator that enables intelligent, continuous workflow execution (constitution -> specify -> plan -> tasks -> implement) with minimal user intervention.
